alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 01 at 6:47PM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West wind 45 to 60 mph with gusts up to 80 mph possible. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
